cookie_based.0-50: You feel like making cookies. But nobody wants to eat your cookies.

cookie_based.5-50: Your first batch goes in the trash. The neighborhood raccoon barely touches it.

cookie_based.50-500: Your family accepts to try some of your cookies.

cookie_based.100-5 K: Your cookies are popular in the neighborhood.

cookie_based.500-10 K: People are starting to talk about your cookies.

cookie_based.1 K-50 K: Your cookies are talked about for miles around.

cookie_based.5 K-50 K: Your cookies are renowned in the whole town!

10 K: Your cookies bring all the boys to the yard.
News: cookies tested on rats, found to have no ill effects.
News: scientist predicts imminent cookie-related "end of the world"; becomes joke among peers.
News: man robs bank, buys cookies.
News: what makes cookies taste so right? "Probably all the [*****] they put in them", says anonymous tipper.
News: man found allergic to cookies; "what a weirdo", says family.
News: foreign politician involved in cookie-smuggling scandal.
News: cookie shortage strikes town, people forced to eat cupcakes; "just not the same", concedes mayor.
News: cookies now more popular than breathing.
News: "you gotta admit, all this cookie stuff is a bit ominous", says confused idiot.
News: movie canceled from lack of actors; "everybody's at home eating cookies", laments director.
News: mysterious illegal cookies seized; "tastes terrible", says police.
Neeeeews: "neeeew EEEEEE keeeeey working fineeeeeeeee", reeeports gleeeeeeeeful journalist.

cookie_based.50 K-1 M: Your cookies now have their own website!

cookie_based.100 K-10 M: Your cookies are worth a lot of money.

cookie_based.500 K: Your cookies sell very well in distant countries.

cookie_based.1 M-5 B: People come from very far away to get a taste of your cookies.

cookie_based.5 M-10 B: Kings and queens from all over the world are enjoying your cookies.

cookie_based.10 M: There are now museums dedicated to your cookies.

cookie_based.50 M: A national day has been created in honor of your cookies.

cookie_based.100 M: Your cookies have been named a part of the world wonders.

cookie_based.500 M: History books now include a whole chapter about your cookies.

cookie_based.1 B: Your cookies have been placed under government surveillance.

cookie_based.5 B: The whole planet is enjoying your cookies!

cookie_based.10 B-50 B: Strange creatures from neighboring planets wish to try your cookies.

cookie_based.50 B-100 B: Elder gods from the whole cosmos have awoken to taste your cookies.

cookie_based.100 B-1 T: Beings from other dimensions lapse into existence just to get a taste of your cookies.

cookie_based.1 T-5 T: The universe has now turned into cookie dough, to the molecular level.

cookie_based.5 T: Your cookies are rewriting the fundamental laws of the universe.

cookie_based.100 T: A local news station runs a 10-minute segment about your cookies. Success! (You win a cookie)
